name: Jason Wong
bio:
Teaching Interests:

Fundamentals of Databases
Software Engineering & Project Development
Security in Computing

 
Current Interests:
I am responsible for coordinating the senior and graduate computer science capstone projects. In this role I work with industry and community organizations to scope software projects that students must complete to fulfill their academic requirements. I also serve as a faculty advisor to a number of these projects.
Prior to joining Seattle University, I worked in the technology industry for 30 years primarily in M&A, consulting and IT.
